Package es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.effects

Interface Summary
Effect This interface defines any individual effect that can be triggered by a player's action during the game.
 

Class Summary
AbstractEffect  
ActivateEffect An effect that activates a flag
CancelActionEffect An effect that cancels the standard action
ConsumeObjectEffect An effect that consumes an object in the inventory
DeactivateEffect An effect that deactivates a flag.
DecrementVarEffect An effect that decrements a var according to a given value
Effects A list of effects that can be triggered by an unique player's action during the game.
GenerateObjectEffect An effect that generates an object in the inventory.
HighlightItemEffect  
IncrementVarEffect An effect that increments a var according to a given value
Macro Group of effects named with an Id, so it can be refered to in diverse points of the chapter
MacroReferenceEffect An based on a reference to a macro
MoveNPCEffect An effect that makes a character to walk to a given position.
MoveObjectEffect  
MovePlayerEffect An effect that makes the player to move to the given position.
PlayAnimationEffect An effect that plays a sound
PlaySoundEffect An effect that plays a sound
RandomEffect Data representation of a random effect.
SetValueEffect An effect that sets a var with a given value
ShowTextEffect An effect that show text in an specific zone in scene
SpeakCharEffect An effect that makes a character to speak a line of text.
SpeakPlayerEffect An effect that makes the player to speak a line of text.
TriggerBookEffect An effect that raises a "bookscene".
TriggerConversationEffect An effect that triggers a conversation.
TriggerCutsceneEffect An effect that triggers a cutscene
TriggerLastSceneEffect  
TriggerSceneEffect An effect that triggers a scene
WaitTimeEffect An effect to wait some time without do nothing
